<<<<<<< HEAD
Pneumatou diakonia, or, Gospel-churches a standing ordinance of Jesus Christ to continue to his next personal glorious coming, plainly proved : objections particularly answer'd / by an unworthy servant ... R.B. Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
[28], 120 p.
Printed by T.M. for Tho. Parkhurst, London : 1682.
Errata on p. [28]. First two words of title in Greek characters. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
